price: Ni ho rero Musa yajana Bene Israyeli mw’ijoro, abacira inzira yumutse mw’ibahari, maze Firawuni amuja mu nyuma ari kumwe n’ingabo ziwe, baraheza batwarwa n’ibahari ku rugero ruzwi gusa n’Imana Allah, maze barasoma nturi bose, Musa n’abo bari kumwe baraheza barajabuka amahoro.
arabic: فَأَتۡبَعَهُمۡ فِرۡعَوۡنُ بِجُنُودِهِۦ فَغَشِيَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡيَمِّ مَا غَشِيَهُمۡ

meta.transliteration: fa-atbaʿahum fir'ʿawnu bijunūdihi faghashiyahum mina al-yami mā ghashiyahum
